website_summaries.verdict: A hydrating anti-aging serum that will quickly become part of your daily routine.
pros: Gives your skin a healthy glow
cons: Some people don't like that it contains mineral oil

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your Buck!💋💋💋
customer_reviews.text: 67years old. NO WRINKLES! Used Clarins since I was 25! It really works! Very little goes a long way, so it really is a good value for the $$$.😍😍😍😍😍😍
customer_reviews.author: Ts

customer_reviews.title: Sticky and greasy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this for years in the winter months , and don’t know whether I got a bad bottle or they have changed the formula, but it is very thick, and takes ages to be absorbed by the skin. 20 minutes later and my skin is still sticky and greasy. Money down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: I feel like this isn't the real product
customer_reviews.text: I feel like this isn't the real product. I had previously purchased Clarins Double Serum from Nordstrom and the consistency was different (thicker). I could use one pomp for my entire face and neck. The one from your website is most likely dissolved with water. Very dissatisfied. When I am done with this bottle, I will buy again from Nordstrom even though is more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love CLARINS DOUBLE SERUM but not this time
customer_reviews.text: I doubt it is a real original Clarin product. The box was unsealed,no product description pamphlet, no aroma from the serum eventhough supposed to be new!! I have used the double serum several years, I know what it is. I love CLARINS DOUBLE SERUM but not this time. I am disappointed the seller who sold this !
customer_reviews.author: Denise Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not the same product as bought in store. Different smell.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! Or at least I love the one I bought at Ulta and at Sephora. This product I bought online is not quite the same. It doesn't have the exact same consistency and definitely has a different smell. I don't know if it has different ingredients. I'm guessing it may have been made in a different country (perhaps EU?) and sometimes that causes a shift in the ingredients. The packaging looks exactly the same. The one I bought at ULTA has a stronger, sweeter fragrance. This one has hardly any fragrance; smells like nothing. (That can be a good thing as fragrance is an irritant, but makes me wonder if it's still the same product).
customer_reviews.author: Ms Em

customer_reviews.title: Works and smells great
customer_reviews.text: Love the fragrance and the overall feel. Leaves my skin glowing and radiant. Have received many compliments and I am definitely loving using this product. Has worked better than anything else so far on my dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: SuperMom

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: It's fake. It has numerous bubbles and some sort of greyish stuff. Inconsistent texture. Worst purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cyril

customer_reviews.title: You look younger for longer using this product
customer_reviews.text: This serum is especially for women over 50. I live in Colorado where it is sunny and dry and it has been the only product that moisturizes and keeps my skin looking soft. It also helps fade dark spots. A must have. X
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Harden

customer_reviews.title: This serum tightens and tones my skin like no other
customer_reviews.text: I have used this and other clarin products for a number of years. This serum tightens and tones my skin like no other. I am never without it. I would suggest using AM and PM. Just a small tab will work for the face and neck.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: I love this serum
customer_reviews.text: I love this serum. This is the only product that really helps me hydrate my skin. It's the 3rd time I buy this one and I'm definitely buying it again after this bottle is empty.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto

customer_reviews.title: Clarins Double Serum
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for several years. It maintains the skin texture and it works well withe the other products.
customer_reviews.author: P. Downer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: This is my go-to facial care and has been for years and years. It works!
customer_reviews.author: Shug

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the way this primes my skin for foundation in addition to moisturizing and texture.
customer_reviews.author: Alex K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful serum. I've ordered it several times, from different sellers, but the stuff works!
customer_reviews.author: leelie

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: This is not the same serum I buy in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Dean

customer_reviews.title: Fake Product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this product all Life. This is completely fake ! Wtf ! Buyer beware ! It’s completely greasy and horrible
customer_reviews.author: Robert Beer

customer_reviews.title: Best serum I've tried
customer_reviews.text: Been using this since it came out and it's my every day serum. I have very dry skin and this keeps it under control in combination with my moisturizers.
customer_reviews.author: NJCathi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product..moisture to my skin, great feel applying and a nice glow (not too shiny).
customer_reviews.author: Lynn A.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I love this serum. This was a great value for this product compared to department stores.
customer_reviews.author: AnnieM

customer_reviews.title: Saving money is nice
customer_reviews.text: My girl loves this stuff I bought 3 because it's such a good price.
customer_reviews.author: R3

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Same as the full-priced ones I used to get from store.
customer_reviews.author: WH

customer_reviews.title: You sent me like q gift but you charged in my account
customer_reviews.text: I love this but you sent me like gift and you charged in my account
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra R.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product!! Your face is not going to be the same! I apply one drop in the morning right after the tonic and before the moisturizer and one drop at night during the same routine
customer_reviews.author: Maria Fernanda Bustillos

customer_reviews.title: ... have used Clarins for nearly 25 years and do recommend it. Product is very good
customer_reviews.text: I have used Clarins for nearly 25 years and do recommend it. Product is very good.
customer_reviews.author: wowita

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love This Product, make my face d Feel so nice, it’s like the macys product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best serum ever. My skin looks so young and smooth!
customer_reviews.author: enriquita marshall

customer_reviews.title: My favorite. Use very little and will last
customer_reviews.text: My favorite. Use very little and will last. Is expensive
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Visible results in jus three weeks..its a wonder product...and the shipment was very fast than the expected time...
customer_reviews.author: Sarath Chandran

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, for the money it's a real value retails in Macy's for 110
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Mineral Oil!?
customer_reviews.text: One of the main ingredients is mineral oil. I didn't realize that when I bought it and now feel stuck with it. My fault for not reading the ingredients before buying, but I never thought a high end product product from Clarins would put out a product that actually sucks moisture out of the skin. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gentle, excellent skin oil.
customer_reviews.text: I use this every night and every morning. It smooths the skin and keeps it moist and bright.
customer_reviews.author: blykin

customer_reviews.title: I feel really disappointed this time
customer_reviews.text: It is a fake product. I feel really disappointed this time.
customer_reviews.author: Yunchou Xing

customer_reviews.title: Totally amazing stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Totally amazing stuff!! Will not be without. EH International filled my order in a timely manner, product was packaged very well. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Walton

customer_reviews.title: I'm sold (repeatedly!)
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have purchased an anti aging product twice. IT IS AMAZING! Makes a noticeable difference in deep lines, blurs fine ones. Highly recommend, all my friends have gotten on board with this.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra M.

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of the new formula
customer_reviews.text: This is (was) a product I can't live without BUT, the new formula leaves a lot to be desired. It's not like it used to be. Definitely not worth the money anymore. On to find a new product.... <sigh>
customer_reviews.author: Sheka

customer_reviews.title: I usually buy this at Nordstrom and love it! I bought this one and it broke ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy this at Nordstrom and love it! I bought this one and it broke me out. I don’t know the authenticity of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Wormy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: One of the best facial serums I've ever used. It's really amazing how your skin looks and feels after you apply it. It's a little pricy, but well worth it as it is a high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: N. Williams

customer_reviews.title: I love Clarine's products
customer_reviews.text: I love Clarine's products. I have been using them for years. I have very sensitive skin but their products never bothers my skin and I think they works well. I love this, feels good on and my skin grow.
customer_reviews.author: worryneko

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: feels great on skin and I think it makes a difference
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Pacheco McGuire

customer_reviews.title: I will continue to buy this product. I am ...
customer_reviews.text: I will continue to buy this product. I am constantly dry and this product helps my moisturizer soak in and really smooths out your face. It feels very nourishing !
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: I like the smell though
customer_reviews.text: I use this serum the third bottle already. I'm not sure if I see any result. I like the smell though.
customer_reviews.author: MOONLIGHT_YUI

customer_reviews.title: I have been using clarins for years. Buying from ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using clarins for years. Buying from amazon saves me a lot of money. Thanks for the affordable prices!!!
customer_reviews.author: School lover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product very much. Thanks for sending it so fast.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie PLV

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the product and love saving a buck or two when I purchase on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Fish

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this product. I need all the help I can get.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Harsch

product_meta.title: Clarins Double Serum Complete Age Control Concentrate 50ml/1.6oz - Large Size
product_meta.description: Two power-packed anti-aging serums in one! Formulated with 21 potent plant extracts—including age-defying Turmeric—to visibly firm, smooth and boost radiance in just 7 days. Performance that goes further in decoding the language of youth to address all visible signs of skin aging. All ages, all ethnicities, all skin types—even the most sensitive skin. Mineral oil free. Satisfaction test - 362 women - 7 days.
feature_bullets: Clarins Double Serum Complete Age Control Concentrate 50ml/1.6oz - Large Size
Item Condition: 100% authentic, new and unused. Clarins Double Serum Complete Age Control Concentrate 50ml/1.6oz - Large Size.
